text: Yoel Schwartz (; 29 September 1939 – 8 September 2022)אבל בעולם התשובה: נפטר המשגיח ואיש החינוך הגאון רבי יואל שוורץ זצ"ל was an Israeli Haredi Jewish rabbi, Torah scholar, and writer. He wrote over 200 Jewish books. He was a senior lecturer at Dvar Yerushalayim yeshiva. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Israeli rabbis Category:Israeli educators Category:Israeli Jewish religious writers
title: Yoel Schwartz
